text: Every contribution, constructive feedback, suggestion welcome! Send us ideas requests issues submit pull request. Pull requests eventually pass tests checks (introducing new ERRORs, WARNINGs NOTEs apart “New CRAN package” NOTE):
code: styler::style_pkg() spelling::spell_check_package() spelling::update_wordlist()  # Code and docs tested, working, committed usethis::use_version(which="patch") usethis::use_version(which="minor") usethis::use_version(which="major") usethis::edit_file("NEWS.md")  # Document to load new package version. Git commit, tag, and push. devtools::document() v <- packageVersion("waRb") system(glue::glue("git tag -a v{v} -m 'v{v}' && git push && git push --tags"))
